properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Cape Blanco OR to Pt. St. George CA out 10 nm; Waters from Cape Blanco OR to Pt. St. George CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 9 at 2:14PM PST until January 10 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, southwest winds 15 to 25 kt
and seas 7 to 8 feet at 10 seconds expected. For the Gale
Warning, southwest winds 25 to 35 kt and seas 8 to 13 feet at
10 seconds expected. For the Hazardous Seas Warning, very steep
and hazardous seas 22 to 27 feet at 16 seconds expected.

* WHERE...Small Craft Advisory conditions expected generally from
Pistol River northward. Then gales expected most areas beyond
3NM from shore except closer near Port Orford with Small Craft
Advisory conditions elsewhere. Warning level conditions expected
all areas.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, from 4 AM to 10 PM PST
Friday. For the Gale Warning, from 1 PM to 10 PM PST Friday.
For the Hazardous Seas Warning, from 10 PM Friday to 4 AM PST
Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds and very steep seas could capsize or
damage vessels. Low visibility conditions are expected.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid strong winds and very steep
seas. Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or
secure the vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 10 PM PST FRIDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 10 PM PST FRIDAY... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM FRIDAY TO 4 AM PST SUNDAY
